text:
The Ant code to run the java compiler in Jikes sets up a character set 
encoding.  When running Jikes, that causes a command line argument to be 
emitted which the PC versions of Jikes DO NOT SUPPORT.
creator: heitkergm@acm.org
bodewig@apache.org
text:
Before you start jumping on Ant or jikes - jikes does support -encoding, it
depends on how you compile it.

Ant passes the encoding attribute through as some people need it.  If your
version of jikes doesn't support -encoding, don't hand Ant the attribute.

See Bug 4230.
